a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Adjusted net savings per capita, 1990 to 2021
Adjusted net savings are equal to net national savings plus education expenditure and minus energy depletion,
mineral depletion, net forest depletion, and carbon dioxide.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
